item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 10, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Internet Archive: Security breach alert (569 points | 357 comments)
2. How to make Product give a shit about your architecture proposal (44 points | 23 comments)

8. A DIY photographer built his own full-frame camera and open-sourced the project (109 points | 20 comments)

10. Indian entrepreneur, industrialist, and philanthropist, Ratan Tata, dead at 86 (50 points | 8 comments)

13. Gboard Double Sided Version (24 points | 9 comments)

15. US weighs Google break-up in landmark antitrust case (360 points | 577 comments)

24. Electric vehicle safety via crash test (28 points | 36 comments)
25. The mystery of why left-handers are so much rarer (2016) (73 points | 188 comments)
26. Motion (YC W20) is hiring our first customer success manager ( | hide)
27. 50 Years of Queries (71 points | 15 comments)

29. Alternatives to cosine similarity (44 points | 14 comments)
